CustomField.description: Shows a flag if the SLA has been breached. Mainly for reporting purposes.
CustomField.formula:
IF( SLA_Breach__c = true, IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/error24.png", "Red", 16, 16),
IF( SLA_Breach__c = false, IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/confirm24.png", "Green", 16, 16), IMAGE("/img/s.gif", "NA", 16, 16) ) )
CustomField.label: SLA Status
